summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Sections 12A.04.050 "Menacing", 12A.16.020 "Disorderly Conduct", 12A.20.110 "False Reporting", 12A.08.300 "Unauthorized Use of a Motor Vehicle", and adding new Sections 12A.04.030 "Simple Assault", and 12A.16.080 "Resisting Arrest", to the Seattle Criminal Code (Ordinance 102843).
